actions.name: End Session
actions.description: Closes a CoE Manager session with Shibumi server.

actions.name: Get Metrics Data
actions.description: Retrieves the metric data for the specified metric.

actions.name: Get opportunities
actions.description: Lists all the opportunities for the specified business unit from CoE Manager and saves the output to a variable.

actions.name: Get opportunity details
actions.description: Retrieves all details for the specified opportunity from CoE Manager and saves the output to a variable.

actions.name: Get question labels
actions.description: Retrieves all the objective questions for an enterprise in CoE Manager and saves the output to a variable.

actions.name: Get workstreams
actions.description: Retrieves a list of business units for the specified enterprise on CoE Manager and saves the output to a variable.

actions.name: New opportunity
actions.description: Creates an opportunity in the specified enterprise and business unit in CoE Manager.

actions.name: New workstream
actions.description: Creates a new business unit in CoE Manager.

actions.name: Start Pipeline Accelerator Session
actions.description: Creates a session to enable connection and interaction with Shibumi server.

actions.name: Update instance attribute
actions.description: Updates the instance details in CoE Manager.

actions.name: Update opportunity
actions.description: Updates the details of an opportunity based on the opportunity ID in CoE Manager.

actions.name: Update process metrics
actions.description: Updates the existing process metrics in CoE Manager based on the Control Room metrics.

actions.description: Sets the value of a credential variable. You can select Credential to use a value from the Credential Vault, Variable to use a credential variable, or Insecure string to manually enter a variable. In the Save the outcome to a variable field, select a variable to hold the returned value.

actions.name: All rows:
actions.description: Enables you to retrieve the values from all the rows.

actions.name: Specific row:
actions.description: Enables you to retrieve the values from the row you have specified in the From row and to row fields.

actions.name: Cell range:
actions.description: Enables you to retrieve the values from the range of cells you have specified in the From cell and to cell field.

actions.name: Configuring SharePoint domain and sites
actions.description: The SharePoint package connects to a particular SharePoint domain using app-based permissions. You must configure your SharePoint domain and add relevant app permissions.

actions.name: SharePoint authenticate action
actions.description: Use the Authenticate action to connect to your SharePoint domain. After the authentication is successful, you can use the other command actions to perform various operations in SharePoint.

actions.name: SharePoint folder and file
actions.description: Use the Folder and file actions to perform various operations in your SharePoint site. You can create, get details, delete, or rename folders in a specific SharePoint site. You can also upload, delete, download, and get files in a specified folder.SharePoint package supports FileStream as a variable. Use the Assign file action to open a FileStream for a SharePoint file, and assign it to a variable. You can then use this FileStream as a variable for the Upload file, the Upload list image, and the Upload list attachment actions.

actions.name: SharePoint list and list items
actions.description: Use the List and list item actions to perform various operations in your SharePoint site. You can create, get, delete, or update list and list items in a specific SharePoint site.

actions.name: Configuring SharePoint domain and sites
actions.description: The SharePoint package connects to a particular SharePoint domain using app-based permissions. You must configure your SharePoint domain and add relevant app permissions.

actions.name: SharePoint authenticate action
actions.description: Use the Authenticate action to connect to your SharePoint domain. After the authentication is successful, you can use the other command actions to perform various operations in SharePoint.

actions.name: SharePoint folder and file
actions.description: Use the Folder and file actions to perform various operations in your SharePoint site. You can create, get details, delete, or rename folders in a specific SharePoint site. You can also upload, delete, download, and get files in a specified folder.SharePoint package supports FileStream as a variable. Use the Assign file action to open a FileStream for a SharePoint file, and assign it to a variable. You can then use this FileStream as a variable for the Upload file, the Upload list image, and the Upload list attachment actions.

actions.name: SharePoint list and list items
actions.description: Use the List and list item actions to perform various operations in your SharePoint site. You can create, get, delete, or update list and list items in a specific SharePoint site.

actions.name: Get text
actions.description: See Using Get text action of Text file package

actions.description: See Read variables action

actions.name: Run
actions.description: See Using Run action.
